name: encounter_drone/stay_2
description:
You take your ID from your wallet and hold the side with the QR code up to the drone. The drone beeps, then plays another prerecorded message:

"Thank you for complying with our requests. We have identified your ID belonging to Areana Avereaux. Is this correct?"

You have no recollection of that name and it certainly isn't one you ever used.
